賜.definition: (bound form) to confer; to bestow; to grant; (literary) gift; favor; Taiwan pr. [si4]

賜姓.definition: (of an emperor) to bestow a surname

賜教.definition: (honorific) to impart one's wisdom; to enlighten

賜死.definition: (of a ruler) to order sb to commit suicide (in lieu of execution)

賜與.definition: variant of 賜予|赐予[ci4 yu3]

賜鑒.definition: (formal) (used in a submitted document) please review; for your kind consideration

賜顧.definition: to honor (sb) by one's visit; to patronize (a shop or restaurant)
